```{r}
rdm_values <- sample(x = 1:500, size = 50, replace = TRUE)  # generate random matrix values
expression_data <- matrix(data = rdm_values, nrow = 5, ncol = 10) # form matrix

# rename matrix rows and columns
rownames(expression_data) <- paste0("gene", 1:5)
colnames(expression_data) <- c(
  paste0("cond", 1:5),
  paste0("ctrl", 1:5)
)

# calculate fold change
fold_change <- rowMeans(expression_data[, 1:5, drop = FALSE]) /
               rowMeans(expression_data[, 6:10, drop = FALSE])
fold_change
```
